abstract: To attract American investors, the Man Group is expanding its product lineup, bolstering its local sales force and striking distribution deals with firms like Morgan Stanley.
snippet: To attract American investors, the Man Group is expanding its product lineup, bolstering its local sales force and striking distribution deals with firms like Morgan Stanley.

headline.main: Big British Hedge Fund Takes Aim at the States
headline.print_headline: A Big British Hedge Fund Seeks to Expand in the States
